name: Starlight Defenders
description:
Another school project where you play as Starlight using a mouse to shoot and bash the Nightmares away from Emily.

Controls (As Emily)
  • Movement - WASD
  • Recall Starlight - Space Bar/Middle Click
Controls (As Starlight)
  • Movement - Mouse
  • Charging Shoot - Left Click (Hold)
  • Release Charge Shoot - Left Click (Release)
  • Rapid Shoot - Right Click
